name: Wuhu Island Free Roam (Wii Sports Resort Map)
name_original: Wuhu Island Free Roam (Wii Sports Resort Map)
description: The island from Wii Sport Resort, ripped, edited a little, and programmed in a way so it can be roamed. Lots of textures need to be sorted and the way they are applied using a .mtl file, and water also needs to be sorted, yet this is an open world version of Wuhu Island ripped directly from Wii Sports Resort BRRES file.
